nodes.text: Solo: A Star Wars Story: Train Heist

Solo: A Star Wars Story: Train Heist is a canon young-readers book that serves as a retelling of an action sequence from the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story. It was written by Ella Patrick and was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on May 25, 2018.
Han Solo and Chewbacca the Wookiee must team-up for a daring train heist on the planet Vandor!
